publications.authors: J. Ryu, H. Kim, S. Wang, J. Yoon.
publications.title: Increasing Resolution and Accuracy in Sub-Seasonal Forecasting through 3D U-Net: the Western US

experience.lab: Climate Analysis and Modeling Lab, GIST
experience.position: Undergraduate Research Intern under Prof. Jin-ho Yoon
details: Explored perturbations in GraphCast to examine error cascades and the butterfly effect.
Investigated the potential use of physics-aligned perturbations to enhance deep learning-based weather forecasting.
Analyzed the relationship between SO₂, NOₓ pollution and Yongsan River water quality using ECMWF data.

experience.lab: Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT), Republic of Korea Naval Fleet Command
details: Distributed batch files to edit registry through NAC (Network Access Control) program and removed vulnerable files in servers and users’ computers to prevent "MS-MSDT" and "log4j" vulnerabilities that allow unauthorized remote access to the Linux server
Analyzed packets and logs of cybersecurity equipment such as firewall and IPS (Intrusion Prevention System), found unidentified or unnecessary communication
